RESUME_TIPS: Quantify the impact of your work with **Power BI** by including metrics like **improved forecast accuracy** or **reduced stockouts by X%**. Add these details under the Experience section, especially when describing your roles at NTT Data and EY GDS.

Highlight your experience with **inventory planning** and **replenishment strategies**. In the project descriptions, specify how you optimized inventory levels and minimized **stock outs** using **Power BI** dashboards.

Emphasize your analytical skills by including specific examples of how you used **Excel** and **SQL** to perform **demand forecasting** and **inventory analysis**. Quantify the improvements achieved through your analysis, such as a **reduction in excess inventory** or **increase in inventory turnover**.

Incorporate keywords related to **retail inventory management**, such as **SKU level analysis**, **ABC classification**, and **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)**. Mention these concepts when describing your responsibilities in projects, showcasing your familiarity with retail specific techniques.

Add specific instances where you collaborated with **sales** and **merchandising teams** to refine **demand forecasts**. Describe how you integrated their inputs into your **Power BI** reports and dashboards to improve **forecast accuracy**.

Include any experience you have with **omnichannel inventory management**, particularly if you have worked with both **retail** and **e-commerce** channels. Highlight how you balanced inventory levels across different channels to meet customer demand while minimizing costs. Mention this in your summary or under your work experience.

Expand on your experience with **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, if applicable. Describe how you integrated these systems with **Power BI** to create comprehensive **inventory management dashboards**. Add this under technical skills.

Showcase your knowledge of **inventory optimization techniques**, such as identifying and addressing **slow moving** and **overstocked items**. Provide examples of how you used **Power BI** to track **inventory turnover** and **aging stock**, and the actions you took based on those insights.

Mention any experience with managing **franchise inventory**, including how you planned **replenishment** for **FOFO (Franchise Owned Franchise Operated)** stores. Detail the process of setting **min max levels** for each store and managing stock movement. Add this in your work experience section.

Provide more details on how you used **Advanced Excel** features like **pivot tables**, **lookups**, and **modeling** to support **inventory planning** and **forecasting**. Include specific examples of how you automated reporting and analysis using Excel functions. Add this under Technical Skills.

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Your Inventory
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn effective inventory planning techniques, including forecasting, safety stock, and order quantity optimization.
This course explores analytical methods for inventory management, covering topics such as demand forecasting and inventory control policies.
A free course covering the fundamentals of inventory management, including different inventory control methods and techniques.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn about various demand forecasting models and methods, including time series analysis and regression models.

Demand Forecasting.COURSE_NAME: Forecasting and Predictive Analytics with Python
Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Use Python to implement various forecasting techniques and build predictive models for time series data.
A practical guide to demand forecasting techniques, including data preparation, model selection, and forecast evaluation.

Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Explore different replenishment strategies for retail inventory, including continuous review, periodic review, and vendor-managed inventory.
Understand how to optimize inventory replenishment through better planning. Optimize service levels while reducing inventory investments.
Learn the basics of inventory management and different replenishment methods. From basic calculations to advanced automation strategies.

Allocation.DESCRIPTION: Optimize inventory allocation across multiple locations or channels to meet customer demand and minimize costs.
This course focuses on inventory allocation strategies within the broader context of supply chain planning.
Learn about the best practices for inventory allocation, including data analysis, forecasting, and decision-making techniques.

Inventory Optimization.DESCRIPTION: Learn the different techniques that go into optimizing inventory in a business setting to cut costs and improve efficiency.
Dive into masterclass-level inventory optimization to cut costs and improve efficiency.
An introduction to inventory optimization including various data strategies.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the foundations of the NetSuite platform and how it can be used for financial management, CRM, and ERP.
Get a thorough introduction to NetSuite ERP, covering key modules and functionalities.
A comprehensive tutorial on NetSuite, covering various aspects of the platform and its features.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Become a master of Zoho and use it to improve inventory management.
Go from nothing to implementation with this guide for the business-minded.
An introduction to all of Zoho's inventory features to get you started.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of running an ecommerce business and apply it to unicommerce.
Learn to get the most out of the software by applying the correct methods and best practices.
A great introduction to get familiar with all of the features and the interface.
